alternateName: A study of sleep efficiency, and sleep patterns.

distribution.name: archive.zip
distribution.description: Archive containing all the contents of the Sleep Efficiency Dataset dataset

distribution.name: Sleep_Efficiency.csv
distribution.description: The dataset contains only this CSV file, we left the splitting and the other tasks for you.

field.name: ID
field.description: a unique identifier for each test subject

field.name: Bedtime
field.description: the time the test subject goes to bed each night

field.name: Wakeup time
field.description: the time the test subject wakes up each morning

field.name: Sleep duration
field.description: the total amount of time the test subject slept (in hours)

field.name: Sleep efficiency
field.description: a measure of the proportion of time in bed spent asleep

field.name: REM sleep percentage
field.description: the percentage of total sleep time spent in REM sleep

field.name: Deep sleep percentage
field.description: the percentage of total sleep time spent in deep sleep

field.name: Light sleep percentage
field.description: the percentage of total sleep time spent in light sleep

field.name: Awakenings
field.description: the number of times the test subject wakes up during the night

field.name: Caffeine consumption
field.description: the amount of caffeine consumed in the 24 hours prior to bedtime (in mg)

field.name: Alcohol consumption
field.description: the amount of alcohol consumed in the 24 hours prior to bedtime (in oz)

field.name: Smoking status
field.description: whether or not the test subject smokes

field.name: Exercise frequency
field.description: the number of times the test subject exercises each week

recordSet.name: Sleep_Efficiency.csv
recordSet.description: The dataset contains only this CSV file, we left the splitting and the other tasks for you.

name: Sleep Efficiency Dataset
description: The dataset contains information about a group of test subjects and their sleep patterns. Each test subject is identified by a unique "Subject ID" and their age and gender are also recorded. The "Bedtime" and "Wakeup time" features indicate when each subject goes to bed and wakes up each day, and the "Sleep duration" feature records the total amount of time each subject slept in hours. The "Sleep efficiency" feature is a measure of the proportion of time spent in bed that is actually spent asleep. The "REM sleep percentage", "Deep sleep percentage", and "Light sleep percentage" features indicate the amount of time each subject spent in each stage of sleep. The "Awakenings" feature records the number of times each subject wakes up during the night. Additionally, the dataset includes information about each subject's caffeine and alcohol consumption in the 24 hours prior to bedtime, their smoking status, and their exercise frequency.
